DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if this is in your hand, it flies back into your draw pile and leaves a #yFeather in your hand.
Draw a card from your Spell Pile. If you are #yAwakened (Played at least #b7 #yPower cards this combat), drawn Spell cards are #yUpgraded [REMOVE_SPACE], drastically increasing their efficacy.
Cards with #yChant effects become more powerful for the rest of combat if the last played card in combat was a #yPower card.
Creatures with #yHex take #b20% more damage from the next Attack for each stack. #yHex is removed all at once after being attacked.
Any effect that causes you to lose [E] , even if you had none to lose.
Whenever you lose [E] , even if you had none to lose, loses HP equal to it's #yManaburn [REMOVE_SPACE].
